trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There were no other sightings in Boca Raton on or around December 31st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking up at the stars with my father and looking at stars. It was new years eve and a bright orange light came and moved very fast, it stopped and was hovering for a brief time. Then it shot up with a orange streak. It then move away and dissappeared in the night sky.
Summary: Bright orange light that moved fast the slowed down then came to a brief stop. Then it shot up with a streak of orange. Then disappeared.
